scripts.prepare-phase1: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 16 pot16_0000.ptau -v -e="Start ceremony" && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot16_0000.ptau pot16_0001.ptau --name="1st contribution" -v -e="I love Dan" && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot16_0001.ptau pot16_0002.ptau --name="2nd contribution" -v -e="share chi Phung di Tu" && snarkjs powersoftau export challenge pot16_0002.ptau challenge_0003 && snarkjs powersoftau challenge contribute bn128 challenge_0003 response_0003 -e="hom nay toi buon" && snarkjs powersoftau import response pot16_0002.ptau response_0003 pot16_0003.ptau -n="3rd contribution" -e="coi chi H kia" && snarkjs powersoftau beacon pot16_0003.ptau pot16_beacon.ptau babc3e6a9c83d0cc0648632cf37528ca89fa37c9c79e944088866a2361 10 -n="Final Beacon"
scripts.prepare-phase2: snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot16_beacon.ptau pot16_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:plonk: snarkjs plonk setup build/withdraw.r1cs pot16_final.ptau build/circuit_final.zkey
scripts.export-vk: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuit_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.make-proof:plonk: snarkjs plonk prove build/circuit_final.zkey build/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify-proof:plonk: snarkjs plonk verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
scripts.build-verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuit_final.zkey contracts/Verifier.sol
scripts.compile: prettier --write ./contracts -l && cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true hardhat compile && solhint --config ./.solhint.json -f table ./contracts/**/*.sol -f table ./contracts/*.sol
